nodes.description: Abedi在Didsbury清真寺的成长经历：被描述为 promising young man，青少年时期前与父亲共同参与宗教活动
nodes.support_text: The religious leader—who saw Abedi, his brothers and conservative father regularly at the site, popular with Manchester’s large Libyan community—said Salman came from a disciplined and well-behaved family. 'They were some lovely kids, they were always with their dad and I was always so impressed with them,' he says.

nodes.description: Abedi家庭背景：父亲Ramadan是利比亚流亡者，2011年革命期间返回利比亚
nodes.support_text: Salman’s father Ramadan, a Libyan exile to Britain, returned to the North African nation in 2011 during the revolution that toppled Muammar el-Qaddafi.

nodes.description: Abedi青少年时期转变：开始变得 withdrawn 和 aggressive，健身房内表现出攻击性
nodes.support_text: But he added that Salman, the second youngest of four children, had become at intervals withdrawn and then hot-tempered in his teenage years. He described how at the gym he attended at the local Hough End Leisure Centre, he was known to be a hostile character. 'He didn't like to talk to anybody but when he did he was really very aggressive,' the mosque manager said.

nodes.description: 警方调查进展：在Fallowfield地区发现爆炸物并实施 controlled explosion，逮捕23岁关联嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: On Tuesday heavily armed officers were pictured by residents in the area as police forensic experts collected evidence from a local address. Greater Manchester Police later carried out a controlled explosion in the Fallowfield area. They also confirmed the arrest of a 23-year-old man in the south of the city in connection with the attack.

nodes.description: ISIS宣称责任：通过 SITE 智能监测组确认ISIS以 'Khilafah'名义宣称袭击
nodes.support_text: ISIS has claimed responsibility for the suicide bomb attack. In a statement posted on Twitter by jihadist monitoring group SITE intelligence, ISIS referred to the suicide bomber as a 'soldier of the Khilafah'...

nodes.description: 英国政府回应：首相府拒绝确认Abedi与伊斯兰极端主义直接关联
nodes.support_text: The office for the British Prime Minister Theresa May has refused to say whether the bomber was linked to Islamist extremism.

nodes.description: 袭击发生时间：2017年5月22日Ariana Grande演唱会期间实施自杀式爆炸，致22人死亡
nodes.support_text: Salman Abedi used to be a 'lovely kid' when he first attended the mosque with his father... Salman Abedi detonated an improvised explosive device as fans streamed out of an Ariana Grande concert.

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击者被关联到伊斯兰极端主义
nodes.support_text: 炸弹袭击者被关联到伊斯兰极端主义

He described how at the gym he attended at the local Hough End Leisure Centre, he was known to be a hostile character.
Salman Abedi detonated an improvised explosive device as fans streamed out of an Ariana Grande concert.
The office for the British Prime Minister Theresa May has refused to say whether the bomber was linked to Islamist extremism.
